user.title: Solar Window System
user.description: Set up the basic parameters for the Solar Window System. All settings can be changed later.

data_description.min_solar_radiation: Minimum radiation (in W/m²) for the calculation to be active.
data_description.min_sun_elevation: Minimum sun elevation (in degrees) for the calculation to be active.
data_description.weather_warning_sensor: A binary sensor that indicates a weather warning (e.g., storm). If 'on', the blinds will close.
data_description.forecast_temperature_sensor: A sensor that provides the temperature forecast for the day. Used for advanced scenarios.

thresholds.title: Thresholds and Temperatures
thresholds.description: Configure the thresholds for solar radiation and the base temperatures for the scenarios.

data_description.threshold_direct: Standard threshold for direct radiation in W/m².
data_description.threshold_diffuse: Standard threshold for diffuse radiation in W/m².
data_description.indoor_base: Standard indoor temperature for scenario A.
data_description.outdoor_base: Standard outdoor temperature for scenario A.

scenarios.title: Scenarios
scenarios.description: Configure the scenarios for the shading logic.

data_description.enabled_scenario_b: Enable Scenario B to handle diffuse heat.
data_description.scenario_c_enable: Enable Scenario C to handle heatwave forecasts.

abort.already_configured: An entry for the Solar Window System has already been configured. You can manage the settings under Integrations.
